entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
